original_text: For the tabernacle of the Lord, which Moses made in the wilderness, and the altar of the burnt offering, were at that season in the high place at Gibeon.
korean_text: 옛적에 모세가 광야에서 지은 여호와의 성막과 번제단이 그 때에 기브온 산당에 있었으나

sentences.original_text: For the tabernacle of the Lord
which Moses made in the wilderness
and the altar of burnt offering
in the high place at Gibeon
